Portal 2 was created during an age of massive growth on the internet. Fandoms were thriving, gaming was going through a revolutionary age of development, and 2008-2012 was THE GOLDEN AGE of this time period, i'm glad Portal 2 was a part of that Golden Age, truly one of the best games ever made by Valve period.


Portal 3 on VR plz.
I wrote a positive review of this product because it is a very good product.

This game is very, very fun and has some great puzzles. But is also like trying to plug in a USB... "Did we try putting a portal here?"

"Ya I think so, let's try again anyways"

"Well that didn't work, let's try it the other way before, maybe we missed something"

"No that didn't work, I think we should try it the first way we did it but put a portal here"

"WE'VE TRIED EVERYTHING HOW DOES THIS NOT WORK!"

"Maybe, we do a backflip into that portal, spread orange goop on that ceiling, place a portal on that wall, fall in the water to kill ourselves so we reset the portals, play rock paper scissors but I have to win, then slam dunk the ball onto the button, all while playing using our feet".

"Oh, I figured it out, turns out we were right the first time the portal was just off center".
포탈시리즈 엔딩을 보지 않은사람은 게임을해봤다고 하지마라

Increible, agarra todo lo que esta bien del Portal 1 y lo lleva una historia completita con plot-twists, enemigos hablando en argentino, escapes y acercamientos... muy personales con aquellos que alguna vez quisieron destruirte, pero tranqui, es una papa. 

De forma inesperada, tambien logra ser uno de los juegos mas divertidos en su modo cooperativo, jugar de a dos no solo te enfrenta a una campaña nueva, sino que encima crea situaciones interesantes que solo se pueden afrontar con un par extra de portales, aparte dos cabezas de robot piensan mejor que una y llegar a una solucion se siente el doble de placentero cuando requiere que vos y tu amigo dediquen el 100% de su capacidad cognitiva y creatividad para deducir donde posicionar sus portales. 

Este titulo sin duda te va a tomar mas de un domingo, pero te invito a que lo visites hasta terminarlo, vale la pena.
(The cake is a social imposition, made for you to buy valve games and eventually have the time of your life with them).

Игра классная и с продуманным сюжетом. Мне понравилось. Особенно нравится "ангельский" голос турелей. Единственный минус в русской озвучке, так это то что когда персонаж что-то говорит в конец реплики может пристроится конечная часть другой реплики того же персонажа. Какого-то дикого дискомфорта не доставляет, просто небольшая недоработка русской озвучки.
Gute Spiel diese, allerdings läuft es ohne die Matschbirne besser!
It's been a loooong time. How have you been?

For Who Is The Game?: The game is for people who are interested in mind games and also for the people into story and valve story.

My own expiriance with the game is pretty good it has decent graphics (no bobbing yay) with some fine story witch gave me emotions altough its not that emotional it has good design for charachters wich people will fall in love with trust me but the voice acting is kind of bad to be honest there is not enough emotions the only ones I can find is like a yayyyy and a sarcastic tone.
Thats what I had to say about the story mode but the coop is better I wont give more spoilers so check it out.
